## PR checklist

- [ ] Documentation updated (e.g. `docs/`, README) if behavior or setup changed
- [ ] Tests added or updated for new or changed behavior
- [ ] All existing tests pass
- [ ] Lint and type checks pass (no new errors or warnings)
- [ ] No duplicate PR for the same change
- [ ] Self-reviewed the diff
